hadiths.text: It was narrated from Suraqah bin Malik that the Prophet(ﷺ) said:"Shall I not tell you of the best charity? A daughter who comes back to you and has no other breadwinner apart from you." (Daif)

chapter.ara-name: باب بِرِّ الْوَالِدِ وَالإِحْسَانِ إِلَى الْبَنَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: Honoring one's father and being kind to daughters
